item.title: Tropical Storm CLAUDETTE Forecast/Advisory Number 2
item.description:
Issued at 2100 UTC MON JUL 13 2015 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM

TROPICAL STORM CLAUDETTE FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   2
NWS NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL       AL032015
2100 UTC MON JUL 13 2015

THERE ARE NO COASTAL WATCHES OR WARNINGS IN EFFECT.

TROPICAL STORM CENTER LOCATED NEAR 38.1N  66.9W AT 13/2100Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM

PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE NORTHEAST OR  45 DEGREES AT  15 KT

ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE 1004 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  45 KT WITH GUSTS TO  55 KT.
34 KT....... 60NE  50SE  20SW  30NW.
12 FT SEAS.. 60NE  60SE   0SW   0NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.

REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 38.1N  66.9W AT 13/2100Z
AT 13/1800Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 37.6N  67.5W

FORECAST VALID 14/0600Z 39.9N  64.9W
MAX WIND  45 KT...GUSTS  55 KT.
34 KT... 70NE  70SE   0SW  30NW.

FORECAST VALID 14/1800Z 42.6N  62.0W
MAX WIND  40 KT...GUSTS  50 KT.
34 KT... 70NE  70SE   0SW   0NW.

FORECAST VALID 15/0600Z 45.7N  59.5W...POST-TROPICAL
MAX WIND  35 KT...GUSTS  45 KT.
34 KT... 60NE  60SE   0SW   0NW.

FORECAST VALID 15/1800Z...DISSIPATED

REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 38.1N  66.9W

NEXT ADVISORY AT 14/0300Z

$$
FORECASTER PASCH
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
